me.gandhiinc.blindeye

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.gandhiinc.blindeye.Player
      • me.gandhiinc.blindeye.AIPlayer

  • public class AIPlayer
extends Player
    AIPLAYER This class extends Player and builds upon to all AI functionality for a player to make choices by itself It contains the following methods: - CompleteTurn(Plot[] plots, MarketPlace market)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Tomlinson
    See Also:
    Player

      • AIPlayer

                int money,
                int ore,
                int energy)
        The is the constructor of the AIPlayer class to instantiate a new instance of the AIPlayer class
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the aiplayer object i.e Player 1
        money - The starting money of the player
        ore - The starting ore of the player
        energy - The starting energy of the player

    • Method Detail

      • CompleteTurn

        public void CompleteTurn(Plot[] plots,
                         MarketPlace market)
        The function for the ai to complete their turn automatically given a list of available plots and the market so that it can interact with them.
        Parameters:
        plots - The list of available plots
        market - The market reference to interact with

      • AIAcquirePlot

        private void AIAcquirePlot(Plot[] plots)
        Allows the AIPlayer to acquire a random plot given a list of available plots
        Parameters:
        plots - List of available plots

      • AIAcquireRoboticon

        private void AIAcquireRoboticon(MarketPlace market)
        Allows the AIPlayer to buy a roboticon from the market given. So if the AIPlayer has enough money to buy a roboticon then it has a 50/50 chance of buying one and then specialising it
        Parameters:
        market - The market to buy the roboticon from

      • AIGamble

        private void AIGamble(MarketPlace market)
        This allows the AIPlayer to gamble at a pub given a market to go to
        Parameters:
        market - The market to access the pub

      • SellResources

        public void SellResources(MarketPlace market)
        If the player has any resources available it will sell them all to the market given
        Parameters:
        market - The market to sell the resources to
